The bucket is filled at a constant rate: a number of         tokens per second. The bucket empties each time there is a withdrawal. Withdrawal         requests for tokens that don't have a configured bucket are delayed.         Note: This code is part of RootERC20BridgeFlowRate. It has been separated out         to make it easier to understand and test the functionality.
